body_content.explanation: a very large, meat-eating dinosaur with large, powerful back legs, small front legs and a long tail. T-Rex is short for Tyrannosaurus rex, a dinosaur of the tyrannosaurus genus (= a group of animals, less similar than a species):
examples: The top speed of a T-Rex has been a controversy for many years now.
There's a Prehistoric Park where you can meet life-size models of T Rex and friends in "natural" habitats.
